        <general>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">My Pet's Identity Card</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Personalausweis Meines Haustieres</string>

          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this activity learners will prepare an identity card for their pet.</string>
          </description>

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta actividad los principiantes prepararán un
documento de identidad para su animal doméstico.</string>
